data.text:
@jakovanrensburg I have just chatted to Chantelle and the bridging deals should only be cancelled at certain stages. That being:

Awaiting Client/Agent/Agency
Awaiting Credit Approval
Awaiting Conveyancer
Approved

Currently on the feature created, the status is after approval and a bridging deal should not be cancelled thereafter. Example when settlement figure paid, etc. 

@shaunviljoen @chantellefrier
